definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: The oven was made of a roughly built cube of fire-bricks.
sentences.chinese: 烤箱是用做工粗糙的近似立方形的耐火砖做的。

sentences.english: The heat loss can be considerably reduced by the use of firebricks round the walls of the boiler.
sentences.chinese: 通过在炉壁周围使用耐火砖，热损失可以被大大降低。

sentences.english: If you use firebricks round the walls of the boiler, the heat loss.
sentences.chinese: 炉壁采用耐火砖可大大降低热耗。

sentences.english: If you use firebricks round the walls of the boiler, the heat loss. Can be considerably reduced.
sentences.chinese: 炉壁采用耐火砖可大大降低热耗。

sentences.english: This can be achieved by means of firebricks.
sentences.chinese: 这一点可以用耐火砖来达到。

sentences.english: The structure of computer supplementary designing system for designing of refractory brick mould has been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了耐火砖模具用计算机辅助设计的总体系统结构。

sentences.english: Tank shell by welding together steel plates with the pylon, lined masonry firebrick.
sentences.chinese: 罐外壳由钢板与吊架焊接而成，内衬砌筑耐火砖。

sentences.english: Heat losses can be reduced by lining the furnace with fire- bricks.
sentences.chinese: 炉热的损失可以用耐火砖搪炉壁的办法来减少。

definition: to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
aggregate (sand or gravel used in concrete 混凝土)
